entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this evening and ending overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 06 January 2023
